title: MediDistribusi frontend UI/UX modernization (theme + screen polish)

requirements.summary: Apply a cohesive modern healthcare-appropriate theme via Tailwind tokens (CSS variables), typography/spacing scale, and consistent light/dark styling across login, header, dashboard shell, and all tabs.
acceptanceCriteria: Light mode and dark mode both have strong contrast, readable typography, and consistent component styling.
The visual theme is consistent across the login screen, header, dashboard shell, and each tab (Overview, Inventory, Shipments, Movements, Facilities, CRM, Reports).
Theme changes are implemented via existing theme tokens (e.g., variables in frontend/src/index.css) rather than ad-hoc one-off colors.

file_operations.description: Update existing theme tokens (CSS variables) for a distinct, professional healthcare palette (avoid blue/purple-dominant hues), including light/dark values for background/foreground/surfaces/borders/ring/chart colors; refine global base typography (headings/body), spacing rhythm, and focus/selection styles so all pages inherit consistent styling. Use token-driven adjustments only (no one-off colors).

Align Tailwind theme extension with updated tokens: refine container/padding breakpoints if needed, extend typography-related theme settings (e.g., font families / shadows / radii) to support a polished, consistent scale across the app while continuing to reference CSS variables.
Ensure the app shell consistently applies the new theme styling to the full viewport (light/dark) and that global layout spacing/background is driven by the updated tokens (no ad-hoc colors).

requirements.summary: Polish Header branding, improve Dashboard tab navigation responsiveness and hierarchy, and standardize UI surfaces (cards/tables/dialogs/forms) with consistent spacing plus shared empty/loading statesâ€”without editing shadcn/ui source files.
acceptanceCriteria: Header remains sticky and clean, with improved brand presentation and a visually balanced user dropdown trigger.
Dashboard tab list is visually clear and responsive (works well on mobile and desktop), and active/hover states are clearly communicated.
Primary UI surfaces (cards, dialogs, forms) have consistent padding, border radius, shadows, and focus states aligned with the new theme.
No changes are made to any files under frontend/src/components/ui; improvements are achieved by composing these components and adjusting app-level styles/layout.

file_operations.description: Create a small, reusable page header component (title, description, optional right-side actions) to enforce consistent visual hierarchy and spacing across tabs. Use the shadcn-ui component library via composition where helpful; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Create a reusable empty-state component (icon, title, description, optional action slot) to standardize empty screens across tables/lists/tabs. Use the shadcn-ui component library via composition where helpful; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Refine sticky header branding block (logo mark, title/subtitle spacing, tone) to match the new theme; adjust the user dropdown trigger to be visually balanced (consistent height, padding, icon/text alignment) while continuing to compose shadcn/ui Button + DropdownMenu (do not modify shadcn/ui sources). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Upgrade the dashboard tabs navigation for responsiveness and clearer hierarchy (mobile-friendly layout such as scrollable/flexible tab list; improved active/hover states via classes consistent with tokens). Keep existing tabs and flows intact; only adjust composition and styling around shadcn/ui Tabs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Polish the login screen layout (hero/feature cards spacing, alignment, and consistent surfaces) to match the new theme and global typography, without changing authentication logic. Compose shadcn/ui Card/Button only (no shadcn source edits). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Standardize container spacing and hierarchy using the new PageHeader; align cards and list sections to consistent padding/radius/shadows and unify empty/loading states (e.g., use EmptyState for no low-stock/pending shipments). Compose existing shadcn/ui primitives only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply consistent page framing with PageHeader and harmonize table container, form/dialog spacing, and empty/loading states (use EmptyState for 'no inventory' and 'no search results'). Do not alter logic; only adjust composition and classes around shadcn/ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply consistent page framing with PageHeader; upgrade table/list container spacing and dialog form layout; unify empty/loading states (use EmptyState for no shipments) while keeping existing flows intact. Compose shadcn/ui primitives only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply consistent page framing with PageHeader; standardize card/table surfaces and dialog form spacing; unify empty/loading states (use EmptyState for no movements). Keep business logic unchanged and do not edit shadcn/ui sources. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply consistent page framing with PageHeader; harmonize facility card grid spacing and icon containers with the new theme; use EmptyState for no facilities and ensure loading skeletons match the new surface styling. Compose shadcn/ui primitives only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply consistent page framing with PageHeader; improve card grid density/spacing and dialog layouts; standardize empty/loading states (use EmptyState) while keeping admin-only controls and existing behavior intact. Compose shadcn/ui primitives only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Apply consistent page framing with PageHeader; improve nested tabs styling/spacing, card/table surfaces, and empty states for 'no report data' using EmptyState while keeping existing report generation flows intact. Compose shadcn/ui primitives only; verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
